mapper.insert: INSERT INTO news ( news_title,news_tag, news_date,news_praise, news_comment,news_content, news_intro,news_isPass, news_view,news_share, news_image,news_hot, news_activity,uaid, news_isCold,news_refuselog, news_award,news_activitylog, news_praiseArr,news_keywords, createdUser, createdTime, modifiedUser, modifiedTime ) VALUE ( #{news_title}, #{news_tag}, #{news_date}, #{news_praise}, #{news_comment}, #{news_content}, #{news_intro}, #{news_isPass}, #{news_view}, #{news_share}, #{news_image}, #{news_hot}, #{news_activity},#{uaid}, #{news_isCold},#{news_refuselog}, #{news_award},#{news_activitylog}, #{news_praiseArr},#{news_keywords}, #{createdUser}, #{createdTime}, #{modifiedUser}, #{modifiedTime} )
mapper.update: UPDATE news SET news_title=#{news_title},news_tag=#{news_tag}, news_date=#{news_date}, news_praise=#{news_praise}, news_comment=#{news_comment}, news_content=#{news_content}, news_intro=#{news_intro}, news_isPass=#{news_isPass}, news_view=#{news_view}, news_share=#{news_share}, news_image=#{news_image}, news_hot=#{news_hot}, news_activity=#{news_activity}, uaid=#{uaid}, news_isCold=#{news_isCold}, news_refuselog=#{news_refuselog}, news_award=#{news_award}, news_activitylog=#{news_activitylog}, news_praiseArr=#{news_praiseArr}, news_keywords=#{news_keywords}, modifiedUser=#{modifiedUser},modifiedTime=#{modifiedTime} WHERE nid=#{nid}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM news where news_title like concat('%',#{news_title},'%') and news_tag like concat('%',#{news_tag},'%') Limit #{startPage},#{pageSize}
SELECT COUNT(1) count FROM news where news_title like concat('%',#{news_title},'%') and news_tag like concat('%',#{news_tag},'%')
mapper.update: UPDATE news SET ${news_image}=null, modifiedUser=#{modifiedUser}, modifiedTime=#{modifiedTime} WHERE nid=#{nid}
